b5df74fa-2a7e-4caf-a5a1-aa2ce23cba06.name: 战斗反射
b5df74fa-2a7e-4caf-a5a1-aa2ce23cba06.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

6d33b124-4ac5-4204-b5f1-110674b4b6de.name: 健康
6d33b124-4ac5-4204-b5f1-110674b4b6de.notes: +1 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate (but not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

40d92f43-b490-4625-a9d8-108b0a4fb926.name: Fit, Very
40d92f43-b490-4625-a9d8-108b0a4fb926.notes: +2 to all HT rolls to stay conscious, avoid death, resist disease, resist poison; recover FP at twice the normal rate; lose FP at half the normal rate (in both cases, not FP spent for spells or psi powers)

77b7092b-392c-4526-9863-8749e738d9b5.name: 高痛阈
77b7092b-392c-4526-9863-8749e738d9b5.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

cb5d8a6c-2d6e-4163-b9b2-88071321b062.name: 和平主义：不能伤害无辜

86b658bc-1e5f-4aa6-a095-fa3361ed2615.name: Judo
86b658bc-1e5f-4aa6-a095-fa3361ed2615.notes: 使得你获得每轮用两只手各招架一次的能力。

c8e0f4e1-e8f1-49b4-8b46-fac57a5cbe65.name: 固有攻击
c8e0f4e1-e8f1-49b4-8b46-fac57a5cbe65.notes: You may not take the Innate Attack skill unless you take the Crushing Attack advantage
